tables: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS farmer (id int, name varchar(255));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dealer (id int, name varchar(255));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS account (id int, login varchar(255), password varchar(255));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS subscription (publisher varchar(255), subscriber varchar(255));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS message ('from' int, 'to' int, text varchar(255));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS complains (id_farmer int, 'to' int, text varchar(255));
